name: Burn Bunny (in space)
description:
In a distant world, bunnies are a source of power and energy. And you've just stole some !
Try to sow the cops, while managing the ever growing expansion of the bunnies by fueling your ship and repairing their damage !

A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40

CONTROLS

- Mouse : Pirate Movement
- Left Click : Pickup a rabbit/Use a rabbit/Repair walls

CREDITS

Sound Designer - Anize Amestoy (http://anizeamestoy.wixsite.com/portfolio)

UI Artist - Yoann D'Orlandi (http://yothpi.wixsite.com/portfolio)

UX/UI Designer - Helios Moreau (https://twitter.com/SirPsychoHelo)

Programmer - Clément Rondeau (http://www.rondeau-clement.fr/)

Game Design - Antoine Sarrazin (http://www.antoinesarrazin.com)

Game Artist - Noémie Szmrzsik-Cohard (http://noemie-szm.jimdo.com)
